creator: rajiv.mordani@sun.com
text:
With a context configuration file in webapps such as 

<Context path="/foo/bar" docBase="../foo/bar"
        debug="0">
</Context>

<Context path="/foo/docs" docBase="../foo/bar/docs"
        debug="0">
</Context>

and the directories have the files that are being served works fine when the
server comes up. However when the restartContext is called (simplest way is to
just make a change in admin tool and commit changes) then the server throws an
exception and I get a 500 error. The stacktrace on the server is
